series.name: One Piece
series.author: Eiichiro Oda
series.description: A rubber-powered pirate sails the seas in search of the ultimate treasure while forging unbreakable bonds with his crew.

chapters.title: Chapter 2: They Call Him "Straw Hat Luffy"

series.name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
series.author: Hirohiko Araki
series.description: Multiple generations of the Joestar family battle supernatural foes using unique powers and style.

series.name: One Punch Man
series.author: ONE
series.description: A bored hero who can defeat any enemy with one punch searches for meaning in heroism.

series.name: Black Clover
series.author: Yūki Tabata
series.description: A magicless boy in a magical kingdom dreams of becoming the Wizard King through sheer determination.

series.name: Jujutsu Kaisen
series.author: Gege Akutami
series.description: A high schooler enters a brutal war against curses after becoming host to a powerful demon.

series.name: My Hero Academia
series.author: Kohei Horikoshi
series.description: A powerless boy in a superpowered society trains to become the world's greatest hero.

series.name: Dragon Ball
series.author: Akira Toriyama
series.description: A pure-hearted martial artist grows from a boy into a legendary warrior while protecting Earth from ever-stronger threats.

series.name: Dragon Ball Super
series.author: Akira Toriyama
series.description: Gods, universes, and multiversal tournaments push Goku and friends beyond their limits.

series.name: Naruto
series.author: Masashi Kishimoto
series.description: A loud, lonely ninja strives to earn respect and become his village's greatest leader.

series.name: Naruto: Shippuden
series.author: Masashi Kishimoto
series.description: Naruto faces war, loss, and destiny as the ninja world teeters on the brink of destruction.

series.name: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
series.author: Ukyo Kodachi
series.description: The son of a legendary hero struggles to define himself in a technologically advancing ninja world.

series.name: Boruto: Two Blue Vortex
series.author: Mikio Ikemoto
series.description: After a devastating twist of fate, Boruto returns stronger and hunted by the world he once protected.

series.name: Attack on Titan
series.author: Hajime Isayama
series.description: Humanity fights for survival behind walls as horrifying truths about their world are revealed.

series.name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
series.author: Koyoharu Gotouge
series.description: A kind-hearted boy hunts demons to save his sister and avenge his family.

series.name: Bleach
series.author: Tite Kubo
series.description: A teenager gains the powers of a Soul Reaper and becomes entangled in battles between the living and the dead.

series.name: Death Note
series.author: Tsugumi Ohba & Takeshi Obata
series.description: A genius student uses a supernatural notebook to impose his vision of justice on the world.

series.name: Fullmetal Alchemist
series.author: Hiromu Arakawa
series.description: Two brothers use alchemy to atone for a forbidden ritual and reclaim what they lost.

series.name: Hunter × Hunter
series.author: Yoshihiro Togashi
series.description: A determined boy enters a dangerous world of elite Hunters to find his missing father.

series.name: Pokémon Adventures
series.author: Hidenori Kusaka & Satoshi Yamamoto
series.description: Young trainers journey through the Pokémon world facing darker and more intense challenges than the games.

series.name: Chainsaw Man
series.author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
series.description: A debt-ridden teen merges with a devil and is thrown into a violent, chaotic world of demon hunters.

series.name: Spy × Family
series.author: Tatsuya Endo
series.description: A master spy forms a fake family, unaware that his wife and daughter hide dangerous secrets of their own.

series.name: Berserk
series.author: Kentaro Miura
series.description: A scarred mercenary fights fate, demons, and despair in a dark medieval fantasy world.

series.name: Fairy Tail
series.author: Hiro Mashima
series.description: A group of eccentric wizards go on magical adventures bound by friendship and loyalty.

series.name: Dr. Stone
series.author: Riichiro Inagaki & Boichi
series.description: A science genius rebuilds civilization from scratch after humanity is turned to stone.

series.name: Vinland Saga
series.author: Makoto Yukimura
series.description: A young Viking seeks revenge before confronting the true meaning of strength and peace.

series.name: Mob Psycho 100
series.author: ONE
series.description: An overpowered psychic tries to live a normal life while learning emotional maturity matters more than power.

series.name: Fire Force
series.author: Atsushi Ohkubo
series.description: Special firefighters battle human combustion while uncovering a conspiracy behind the flames.

series.name: Seven Deadly Sins
series.author: Nakaba Suzuki
series.description: Disgraced legendary knights reunite to save a kingdom from corruption and war.

series.name: Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End
series.author: Kanehito Yamada (story), Tsukasa Abe (art)
series.description: A long-lived elf mage reflects on time, loss, and legacy after the hero’s journey has already ended.

series.name: Kaiju No. 8
series.author: Naoya Matsumoto
series.description: In a world plagued by monsters, a middle-aged cleanup worker gains the power to transform into a kaiju himself.

series.name: Gachiakuta
series.author: Kei Urana
series.description: A cast-out youth survives a brutal junk-filled underworld where discarded objects and people become deadly weapons.

series.name: Solo Leveling
series.author: Chugong
series.description: A weak hunter gains a unique leveling ability, allowing him to grow infinitely stronger in a monster-filled world.

series.name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
series.author: Fuse
series.description: A man reincarnates as a slime monster and uses evolving abilities to build a powerful, inclusive fantasy nation.

series.name: Overlord
series.author: Kugane Maruyama
series.description: A trapped MMO player remains logged in as an undead sorcerer and decides to conquer the world with overwhelming power.

series.name: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation
series.author: Rifujin na Magonote
series.description: A failed man is reborn into a fantasy world and resolves to live his new life without regrets.

series.name: The Rising of the Shield Hero
series.author: Aneko Yusagi
series.description: A summoned hero armed only with a shield is betrayed and must rise from hatred and hardship to survive.
